page.title: 13HOME LIFE contd.
page.content: Lunnon cottage is only one of a large number of cottages, farmhouses, barns and even a rectory, which have been bought in the last few years and renovated or even reconstructed as modern homes. Within the parish of Rushock now live a travel agent, a solicitor, an estate agent, an antique restorer, a designer of carpets and an analytical chemist. The changes in population have obviously altered the social groups within the parish. Some of the long term parishoners bridge the gap between themselves and the new members, but others seem to resent the influx, even though it has meant the population of Rushock has been maintained. Those people who have moved into the parish recently, feel the need to become part of the community and the Parish Church has become the
